summary: The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles  or in the UK earlier known as the Teenage Mutant Hero Turtles  are a group of fictional characters.
full_text:
The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles  are four fictional teenage anthropomorphic turtles, named after four Renaissance Italian artists, who were trained by their anthropomorphic rat sensei in the art of ninjutsu. From their home in sewers of New York City, they battle petty criminals, evil overlords, mutated creatures, and alien invaders while attempting to remain hidden from society. They were created by Kevin Eastman and Peter Laird.
The characters originated in comic books published by Mirage Studios before expanding into cartoon series, films, video games, toys, and other general merchandise. During the peak of the franchise's popularity in the late 1980s and early 1990s, it gained considerable worldwide success and fame.
title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
